definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

pinyin: sui3 guo4 yang3 hua4 wu4 mei2

sentences.english: Insulin was labeled with horseradish peroxidase by sodium periodate oxidation method.
sentences.chinese: 用高碘酸钠氧化法将辣根过氧化物酶标记于胰岛素。

sentences.english: Presently, Peroxidase is employed as indicator for blanching treatments of vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 目前蔬菜的热烫终点以过氧化物酶作为指示剂来确定。
可能生成爆炸性过氧化物。

sentences.english: Orgnic peroxides are the initiators used in polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 有机过氧化物可用作聚合引发剂。

sentences.english: The activity of manganese-dependent peroxidase was determined by using guaiacol as substrate.
sentences.chinese: 拟定了用愈创木酚测定锰过氧化物酶活力的方法。

sentences.english: The crystals were confirmed to be the SHP crystal through enzyme activity test.
sentences.chinese: 活性检测证实，所得到的晶体为过氧化物酶晶体。

sentences.english: The effect of peroxide to aggrandize bromoform sonolysis is proved.
sentences.chinese: 验证了过氧化物对超声波处理溴仿的强化作用。

sentences.english: It is well known that hydroperoxides are unstable and decompose spontaneously.
sentences.chinese: 这是众所周知，氢过氧化物是不稳定的和自发分解。

sentences.english: During bulb morphogenesis, the activity and the number of isozymic bands of peroxidase increased.
sentences.chinese: 鳞茎发生过程中过氧化物酶活性及同工酶带逐渐增加。

sentences.english: Changes in activity of peroxidase in leaf disks of Vitis bryonifolia under salinity were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了盐渍下华北葡萄叶过氧化物酶活性变化。

sentences.english: Glutathione peroxidase ( GSH - Px ) acts as a free radical scavenger .
sentences.chinese: 谷胱甘肽过氧化物酶是生物机体内的自由基清除剂。

sentences.english: Coagent Selection For Peroxide-Cured Elastomers , from Sartomer Company, Inc. It is good for Peroxide-cured rubber compound design.
sentences.chinese: 美国沙多玛公司，过氧化物硫化共架桥剂选择资料。

sentences.english: Hormones and nutritional factor can regulate peroxisome proliferation response.
sentences.chinese: 持续的过氧化物酶体增殖可导致肝癌。

sentences.english: Selenium content in wool is closely related to erytlirocyte glutathione peroxidase activity in blood of sheep .
sentences.chinese: 羊毛硒含量与羊血谷胱甘肽过氧化物酶活性显著相关。

sentences.english: The activity of glutathione peroxidase of serum was measured.
sentences.chinese: 同时测定血清谷光苷肽过氧化物酶活性。
氢过氧化物是不稳定的化合物。
